com.sorting.components

Class InsertionSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sorting.components.AbstractSort
      • com.sorting.components.InsertionSort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstrumentationSort

    @Component
 @Qualifier(value="InsertionSort")
public class InsertionSort
extends AbstractSort
implements InstrumentationSort
    An implementation of InstrumentationSort that contains methods for performing insertion sort. Efficient for (quite) small data sets, much like other quadratic sorting algorithms.

    The algorithm uses a recursive approach to sorting. (InsertionSort)

    The algorithm offers О(N^2) quadratic for worst and average case performance. While it's best case performance is linear О(N)

    Since:
    March 2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joshua Nwankwo

    • Method Detail

      • swapUntilSortedState

        public void swapUntilSortedState(int[] arr,
                                 int index)
        Implemented using recursion for elegance and readability. A case for recursion is made in the following stackoverflow links
        Parameters:
        arr - the array to be sorted
        index - the current index
        See Also:
        Question 242889 It swaps the position of items in an array until a sorted state is attained. It does this by holding the value of the current index in a cache (currVal) and then replaces that with the previous and vice-versa provided the swap rule is satisfied.

      • sort

        public int[] sort(int[] arr)
        Sorts an array in-place starting from the second item in the array. The swapUntilSortedState(int[], int) is called when current value is less than the previous.
        Specified by:
        sort in interface InstrumentationSort
        Parameters:
        arr - the array to be sorted

      • execute

        public SortResponse execute(int[] arr)
        A forwarding method which overrides the behaviour of the parent abstract method in an attempt to set the number of iterations.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface InstrumentationSort
        Overrides:
        execute in class AbstractSort
        Parameters:
        arr - raw input array
        Returns:
        returns SortResponse which contains a bunch of properties
